reviews.sentence: Pol Hot Tub Ladies shower dry sauna Lounge chairs with towels draped over top. Dragon Tree Spa Location Rom Service Fre convenient parking Fre WiFi Next to Cascade Station and ikea Cozy bedding. Could be cleaner in general. Pool area ladies room in pool area. Our room. Toilet had not been fully cleaned had to wipe down the dust on the vents and did not not feel the furniture or anything gets cleaned just beds changed and toiletries and towels restocked. Loud hallways you can hear everything. Drunks at night and kids in the morning.

A haven for weary travelers. Extremely short stay for my wife and myself. Arrived about 730 pm after a long drive from Yakima. I left at 70 am driving and my wife left at 930 am flying. Very comfortably sized room. Staff was excellent. Restaurant and bar were very good. Would definitely stay again.

Family visit. This was a short family visit added to a much longer vacation to the west coast. We love Portland have been here many times before. We stayed in the Pearl district at the Rose Hotel one night although pricey very convenient to area we liked wanted to be. We stayed one night at the Sheraton Airport because of convince to airport as we had an early flight back to Florida. No suprises at the Sheraton. All went as planned.

Close to airport as needed but quiet. We needed a quiet room close to PDX. Nice bar. Big comfortable bed. Wake up call timely for early morning flight. Close to PDX. Quiet. Had a bar. Easy to get to. One night stay so did nothing nearby. Close to airport with free shuttle. Carpeting in lobby looked a bit shabby.

Personally disapointed overall ok. I have stayed at surrounding hotels and I recall not having issues with them and was pleased with my stay. This business trip was pre arranged for me and thought it was a good opportunity to review it anyways. Let me start by saying the double bed room are literally doubles not accommodating for 2 adults on 1 bed. My family and i stayed 4 it was a bit cramped sleeping. Walking in and looking at the bathroom I immediately thought trouble because of my personal preference of comfort height toilets and The toilet was tiny and round but I said oh well. It will do. Then I brushed my teeth and the sink filled half way up gross. It 1030 pm and I was not calling the front desk to complain knowing nothing could be done and I was tired. So I took a shower the tub filled up with about 5 inches water immediately. GROSS. Other peoples water and what ever I am sure came back up just like I could see in the sink oh and some how the floor was all wet when I got out leak somewhere idk. Next morning I did speak to front desk they addressed the issue while I was gone water only filled up about 3 inches in the tub and I guess I forgot to tell them about the sink. Sink gross. Toilet gross do not even want to shower but I guess i have to. I asked others in my group if they had the same issue and apparently it is just my rom237. House keeping was good breakfast and restaurant were good too. Cleanliness was good. Bedding was good. Pillow were good. I could not find anything else really wrong with the room or hotel except the plumbing for my romBecause of this I am going to rate it an average I guess hotels do not really know when a Trip Advisor reviewer comes on the premises and get a room that is not up to par. May give this facility another chance another time. At the moment I am not completely sure. 3 nights stay standing in gross water or using the sink with gross water I will have to really think it over. I honestly think my room was poor but to be fair it seemed to be just plumbing. I could not have been the only one to complain so shame on the hotel for booking the room without addressing the issue first. Below average Poor.

Far From Sheraton Standards. The hotel is sad and dated. I have n’t given it much of a chance having arrived a short while ago so perhaps I ’m rushing to judgement. To get the shuttle you have to call the hotel after claiming baggage. It took about a half hour for the shuttle to arrive while standing in the outdoor waiting area. Then the shuttle makes other stops en route since it serves three hotels. The greeting at check in is far less than welcoming. Not quite hostile but entirely indifferent. Nonetheless it ’s the closest hotel to the airport and so I assume the return trip will be faster.

Convenient but certainly in need of the renovations. I stayed here because I needed to be close to the airport for an early flight. However the shower water was barely warm most of the time until it switched to too hot for a few seconds then back again. not what I needed when coming in from a cold rainy evening. The room was clearly in need of renovation which I understand is coming but it needed a lot of help. Patches in the ceilings and general worn out appearance. Having to unplug something tv or refrigerator in order to plug in the coffee maker is not ok either. In general I wished I had chosen one of the other close by places.
The rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable. The room service is quick and friendly. The only downside was that one of the three elevators was non operational.

Needs Improvement. Checking in was good friendly. The room appeared clean however they wanted a 30 charge for a bottle of water sitting in the room. The beds were hard uncomfortable. Room service stopped at 100 because of the remodel so we had to venture out to find something to eat. Very little choice at 100 at night in the area. Worst part was a fire and health hazard tried to plug something into the wall. The socket pulled out of the wall and started sparking. Their contractor messed up that one. Shorted out the lights and electrical. Needed to plug in my machine for medical purposes so we waited until 130 am for them to bring an extension cord. We were credited some off our room in the morning but I would not recommend taking the chance until they can assure everything is working correctly. Not muchFix the hazards get better matresesan airport and not much choice in places to eat.

Disappointed by Sheraton. 1 Shower had very low water pressure plus the hot water would come and go leaving you with a cold shower every 10 seconds. shower very slipery2 Had to keep asking for extra towels and soap since there were 3 of us and would only count 2 people. He said I do not know I am talking to somebody else. He slurred his words and did not seem to be listening. I asked his name and he said Dwayne although he sounded foreign. I asked if he was the Manager and he told me he was the MOD and hung up. I understand maintenance however after a direct request I would have expected a little consideration at least. I tried to reach Sheraton but can not find a contact number for a true Manager and I will continue to look for someone there. We are frequent travelers and have never been treated like this before with complete disregard somewhat like the tourist places that think you are only there for a little bit and will move on so it does not matter. Sheraton has certainly come down in quality this would never happen at a Ritz or Mariot. Bed maybe Airport Supervisory personnel front desk personnel bathrooms phone being across from the beds so you need to get up to use the phone. Very bad TV reception.

The waiter at the restaurant Steve was so kind to my family while they were delayed in the airport due to inclement weather. He saw that their stay had been extended and he MADE a tour guide for them. Way to go Steve. You made their stay more than comfortable. The hotel staff was exemplary in general. From the front desk atendants who allowed my family to leave their luggage downstairs while they balanced two kids to the room attendant who gave my niece a present a pack of tissues that she knew would make her day and did. it was an excellent representation of the Sheraton Portland Airport Hotel. I thank you Sheraton Portland Airport Hotel. My thoughts are sent from New Jersey.

great food and nice stay. Excellent food and great acomodations. Shuttle service to the airport is excellent and drivers very friendly. Location is very convenient and they have an indoor pool too. Stay here and you will not be a bit sorry.

Sheraton Hotel at the Portland Oregon Airport. Newly remodeled clean and friendly. Booked a club room and had access to a free happy hour it was niceShutle was there asap and a minute to airportLove the convenience for early flights.

Portland Salsa Congress. Spent a lovely weekend in Portland to attend the Portland Salsa Congress which was held at the Sheraton. The shuttle from the airport to the hotel was easy to find and the drivers were very nice. I had book My reservation thru the event and request a handicap accessible room. I was given room 501 which was just off the elevator. While the the bathroom did not have a shower chair as I requested the handrail made it doable for my disability. The room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. The best part were the pillows. I wanted to take them home. Only negative was the room seems a little dusty like it had n’t been used for a bit. There was dust on the lamp coffee pot and side table. The tub needed a good scrub but when I ran my shower it improved. The staff is what made my stay. The lobby staff suggested places to eat downtown that were amazing. They were just as excited for the salsa Congress as we were which made it extra special. Will definitely recommend. Catching the Max was a breeze. Thank you for a great stay.

Very comfortable stay at the Sheraton Hotel at the Portland OR airport. This is a very comfortable modern Hotel very close to the airport in Portland. It is a mid rise hotel that has recently completed an update. Very clean entrance way into the hotel elevator and hallways. Nice clean carpet throughout which was a nice surprise. My room was very comfortable in every way to include the king size bed and small sofa which was in the room. My only comment about the decor is it was a bit dull. I thought it nededsome additional color however the color scheme was calming and serene. Perhaps this is what is needed for hurried travelers. Even though the hotel is right next to airport runways I never heard planes taking off or landing. Very nice and restful place to spend the night. I will stay here again. Oh yes bathroom very clean with adequate amenities and towels etc. Convenient Hotel Van will transport you to and from the airport to get flights.

Clean but it feels like you are at the airport already. And the gift shop charge me 5 for a Starbucks plan coffee. The restaurants good as well but you will pay for it. Not up to the DoubleTree standard unfortunately.
Great hotel and good shuttle service to the airport.

great place to stay. This place is very comfortable and close to airport. They have a very good service to and from the airport. The rooms are great and quiet. The food is good and the bar service is the best. Well done Rocky.

The room was comfortable and clean wifi and TV service worked smoothly no complaints. The restaurant was decent and the pool and hot tub look great but unfortunately it was too crowded when I was there so we did not get to try it out.
Love this hotel and it is staff. They are incredibly helpful and nice.
